casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Shakita Necole WALTON 311PA18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 4, 2019 Hannah H. Love, Assistant Appellate Defender, G. Glenn Gerding, Attorney at Law, for Walton, Shakita Necole.

Glenn Gerding, Appellate Defender.

Heather Haney, Assistant Attorney General, Kimberly N. Callahan, Assistant Attorney General, R. Andrew Womble, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 4th of February 2019 by Appellate Defender to Allow Counsel to be Withdrawn and for Appellate Defender to Assign Additional Counsel:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 4th of February 2019."
